short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AliExpress Search by Image with an image url or image file.
short.es: Búsqueda de AliExpress por imagen con una URL de imagen o un archivo de imagen.
short.fr: AliExpress Recherche par image avec une URL d'image ou un fichier image.
short.ru: Поиск AliExpress по изображению с URL-адресом изображения или файлом изображения.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search By Image on Aliexpress with an image url or image file.

Aliexpress image Search enables to find  items on AliExpress.com using an image or photo of products Image url or image file. 

Aliexpress image  search extension is very easy to use.

Check if the product is sold cheaper by another AliExpress seller and best tool for Aliexpress. Also you can now easily create tables to compare Products' price, total sold Products , Seller rating etc. So, Search for products on AliExpress by image url or image file and find similar products.

It is difficult to imagine modern shopping without stores like AliExpress. tens of millions of people are shopping, updating their wardrobe, simplifying their lives thanks to AliExpress. We did not stand aside and decided to make it easier for you to search for the products you are interested in on AliExpress.

N.B:-By installing this Chrome extension you accept redirecting you to the links of the affiliate program AliExpress. 
How to use the extension:

1.Add to Chrome.
2.Copy the Api key and paste it.
3.Or registar a New Api key from register.
4.Go to any image any click on left mouse button and click on Aliexpress image Search.

Features:
1.Don't Redirect to google like other extension
2.Option for seller rating
3.Lots of simillar product
4.Number of sold product from the seler

We have added functionality that allows you to search for products on AliExpress.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us.
